title: Love Island’s Amy Hart laughs off Toby Anstis romance claims: ‘He’s same age as my mum'
text:
Amy Hart opened up about those Toby Anstis dating rumours (Picture: Mega)

Amy Hart has been linked to a string of famous faces since she walked out of the Love Island villa single, following her failed romance with Curtis Pritchard.

She was most notably rumoured to be seeing DJ Tony Anstis, after they enjoyed an evening out to watch the Lion King together.

However, speaking exclusively to Metro.co.uk at the launch of her In The Style collection, the 27-year-old insisted there is absolutely nothing going on between them, so we can all calm down.

Clearing up all the speculation, she told us: ‘I helped him out on his radio show last minute. He said, “Oh you love musicals, don’t you? Have you seen the Lion King?”

‘I said I’d never seen it and he said, “Neither have I, let’s go to say thank you”.

‘Nothing romantic, obviously. He’s like, 49, which is the same age as my mum.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Nothing romantic but he’s a nice guy.’

To be fair, Toby is only 48, so maybe not quite the same age as your mum.

Amy became a household name following her stint in the villa, with her exit bringing the entire country to tears.

And the former air hostess explained that it’s a lot harder to know exactly who to trust now she’s back home.

Discussing her love life, she continued: ‘I met a guy in Dubai actually and he was like, “Oh, yeah, I didn’t watch Love Island.” [I thought] Okay, brilliant.

Amy has found the dating world tough since returning home from Love Island (Picture: In The Style)

‘My best friend said to him, “Oh so you didn’t watch it then?” and he started laughing, saying: “I watched every episode but I’m not gonna tell her that”.’

Not ideal.

‘I’ve been out on a couple of dates with people, but at the moment I’m so busy,’ she added.

‘I thought going on Love Island was going to solve all my problems with dating, because when I was an air hostess, I couldn’t meet people that easily.

‘I thought it was going to make my life easier being around, but I’m never around anyway!’

Advertisement

description: Love Island’s Amy Hart laughs off Toby Anstis romance claims after they were spotted watching The Lion King together
